VIEWS, pREvIEws
AND REVIEWS


Edward Banks

The residents OF the united
States are the most adver-
tised at and sold to persons
on the face of the globe.
Every four minutes someone is
trying to sell you something or
other. EV


other. Every four minutes you
are being bombarded to buy this
try this or do this.


From infancy until senility we
are subjected to the wiles and
Wills of the advertisers. No
longer do hawkers follow the will
derness trails with wagon full
of wares beseeching you to try
a sure cure. The hawkers per-
wade your home in the guise of
entertainment free or almost
free.


Headache potions, lumbago
rubs. cold remedies and collie
soothers are dispersed with the
careful plans of analysts who
know how to reach you where it
hurts the most = in the purse.


Not only do these modern witch
doctors sell their pr oducts but the
churches and other social
agencies have become adver-
tising conscious. Slogans have
become the way to all mems
minds. "The family that prays
together, stays together" is just
as we'll planned as "Not a hint
of lint


A breakfast cereal no longer
can serve your dietary needs with
ample vitamins, 1t must be the
only talking cereal in existence.
Dogs can not enjoy a regular
can of dog victuals unless you
want the NUTS to be happy. The
lowly aspirin has been buffered
and rebuffered until it has lost
its sting. Smoking cigarette
involoves clinical testing and
porosity counting of the filters.
All in all they took the fun
out of buying. You don't have a
chance to question the brand any
more most articles have more
seals of Apr oval than Audie
Murphy has military medals.


Consumer magazines test all
kinds of appliances. women's
magazines present detailed re-
ports on foodstuffs, and sleekly
dressed ladies with chic Golf
fures demonstrate clothes dryers
and cooking wares. Bottles Of
milk dance, packages Of cigars
wink, automobiles talk and Aka
Settlers fizzle.


Reassert your individuality =
the next time you 60 shopping buy
just one product that has been
recommended by Goody Home
wreckers or Miss Punkin Kinds.
Don't smoke a filter tip, chew
a plug of tobacco. Don't go to
Church next Sunday, stay in
bed. Gosh, | must stop = it's
ten o'clock = time for my Three
A Day vitamin capsule gulp

and issues.


1t is a universal slogan which tells us to O0te.

Action on the part Of John Duncan, state SUP
eY5ntendent of liquor control and his staff IS COM
mendable. The closing of the Infamous Trot Inn,
located near 24th and E. BYoad1Uuy Rd., ouS long
overdue.


Records show that in the past tho years i'untm-
enable persons haze been injured by knives, guns,
brass knuckles, bottles and fists.


Three we're fatally 1Uounded there in the same
period without any hating Of sales.


our Negro communities must become more
active in assuring themselves that lam and order
PREVAIL. We cannot tolerate places WaeYe Ines

Let there be more closed doors Of taUeYns that

fortunately the TYOt Inn is not the only place OF

fully.


There is no need to blame others for conditions
